nodes.text: Bravo Flight, also called Bravo Squadron, was the starfighter squadron that took part in the Battle of Naboo during the Trade Federation's invasion of the planet.

Ric Olié flew as Bravo Leader during the battle, leading the squadron against the Federation's Droid Control Ship and vulture droids. Porro Dolphe flew as Bravo Two, Arven Wendik flew as Bravo Three and Dineé Ellberger flew as Bravo Five.
